TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the family of drugs called S-adenosylmethionine decarboxylase inhibitors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del c√°ncer. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la descarboxilasa S-adenosilmetionina.
